snippet: Buccaneers kicker Connor Barth will miss the season with a torn Achilles’ tendon, and the team signed Lawrence Tynes, a former Giant, as his replacement.
abstract: Tampa Bay Buccaneers sign kicker Lawrence Tynes to replace Connor Barth, who will miss the upcoming season with a torn Achilles' tendon; other NFL news noted.
lead_paragraph: Buccaneers kicker Connor Barth will miss the season with a torn Achilles’ tendon, and the team signed Lawrence Tynes, a former Giant, as his replacement.

headline.main: With Barth Set to Miss Season, Buccaneers Sign Tynes
